createSong.generatedVersions: We created 2 special versions of your story. Which do you prefer?
createSong.tipDescription: The more details you provide in the briefing, the better the lyrics will be! Names, dates, places, and special moments make all the difference.
createSong.approveOrModify: Approve the lyrics or request one modification before production
createSong.warningOneModification: ‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: You can only modify ONCE!
createSong.modificationOptional: This step is optional. If you're happy with the lyrics, you can approve directly. If you request a modification, you'll be able to choose between the original and modified version.
createSong.modificationPlaceholder: Describe the changes you want... E.g.: 'Change word X to Y', 'Make the chorus more upbeat', 'Add the name Maria in verse 2'...
createSong.noRefunds: After approving the lyrics, there are no refunds
createSong.reviewCarefully: Review carefully before confirming. Once approved, the lyrics go into production and cannot be changed or refunded.
createSong.compareVersions: Compare the original version with the modified one and choose which to approve
createSong.generatingDescription: Our AI is creating 2 unique versions based on your story. This may take a few seconds.
createSong.almostThere: Preparing your song... you'll be redirected shortly!
createSong.orderNotYours: This order doesn't belong to you
createSong.reviewYourLyric: Review your lyrics and approve for production
createSong.chooseVersions: Choose from the versions created for you
createSong.tryRefresh: Try refreshing the page in a few seconds
createSong.chooseVersionsCreated: Choose from the 2 versions created for you
createSong.alreadyUsedModification: You've already used your only modification
createSong.chooseOriginalOrModified: You can choose between the original or modified version
createSong.lyricNotLoaded: The lyrics were not loaded correctly. Try selecting again.
createSong.needLogin: You need to be logged in
createSong.readyForProduction: Your song is ready for production!
createSong.rateLimitError: System busy. Try again in 1 minute.
createSong.createOrderError: Error creating order. Please try again.
createSong.lastChance: This is your last chance to choose. Once approved, the lyrics go into production and cannot be changed or refunded.
createSong.readyForStep2: Your song is ready for Step 2: Music Production

preview.downloadBlockedDesc: This is a test preview. Purchase credits to download the full song.
preview.notice: This is a preview (Verse + Chorus). To download the full version with all verses and final quality, purchase credits.
